domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

text: @cnnbrk Expect to hear a lot of businesses blaming COVID-19 for the final nail in the coffin. All COVID-19 did was expose the cracks that were already apparent. Some of these businesses are too big and have too many locations. Overexposure is the problem.
